languages.text: "Щедрые сердцем не прячут чувств, но осыпают близких дарами. Не буду скрывать, выбрать достойный подарок для Вольного Торговца было непросто, но я постаралась. Вам нравится?"

"Generous hearts do not hide their feelings but shower their nearest and dearest with gifts. I won't deny it — choosing a gift worthy of the Rogue Trader wasn't easy, but I tried my best. Do you like her?"
languages.original_text: "Щедрые сердцем не прячут чувств, но осыпают близких дарами. Не буду скрывать, выбрать достойный подарок для Вольного Торговца было непросто, но я постаралась. Вам нравится?"

languages.text: “慷慨之人从不隐瞒自己的情感，而会将礼物带给他们最亲近的人。不得不说，想选择一件配得上行商浪人的礼物并不容易，但我已经尽力了。你喜欢她吗？”
languages.original_text: "Generous hearts do not hide their feelings but shower their nearest and dearest with gifts. I won't deny it — choosing a gift worthy of the Rogue Trader wasn't easy, but I tried my best. Do you like her?"

traits.locale_text: “慷慨之人从不隐瞒自己的情感，而会将礼物带给他们最亲近的人。不得不说，想选择一件配得上行商浪人的礼物并不容易，但我已经尽力了。你喜欢她吗？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「寛大な心の持ち主は、自分の気持ちを隠すことなく、親しい人に贈り物をするものだからね。あたしも否定はしないよ…自由開拓者にふさわしい贈り物を選ぶのは簡単じゃなかったけれど、私はベストを尽くしたってことをね。気に入ったかい？」
languages.original_text: "Generous hearts do not hide their feelings but shower their nearest and dearest with gifts. I won't deny it — choosing a gift worthy of the Rogue Trader wasn't easy, but I tried my best. Do you like her?"

traits.locale_text: 「寛大な心の持ち主は、自分の気持ちを隠すことなく、親しい人に贈り物をするものだからね。あたしも否定はしないよ…自由開拓者にふさわしい贈り物を選ぶのは簡単じゃなかったけれど、私はベストを尽くしたってことをね。気に入ったかい？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Los corazones generosos no ocultan sus emociones, sino que colman de regalos a sus más allegados. No negaré que encontrar un regalo digno de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente ha sido difícil, pero he hecho lo que he podido. ¿Le gusta?».
languages.original_text: "Generous hearts do not hide their feelings but shower their nearest and dearest with gifts. I won't deny it — choosing a gift worthy of the Rogue Trader wasn't easy, but I tried my best. Do you like her?"

traits.locale_text: «Los corazones generosos no ocultan sus emociones, sino que colman de regalos a sus más allegados. No negaré que encontrar un regalo digno de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente ha sido difícil, pero he hecho lo que he podido. ¿Le gusta?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Quand on est généreux, on ne cache pas ses sentiments ; on noie ses proches sous les cadeaux. Je ne vais pas vous mentir, j'ai eu le plus grand mal à trouver un cadeau digne d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, mais j'ai fait de mon mieux. Elle vous plaît ? »
languages.original_text: "Generous hearts do not hide their feelings but shower their nearest and dearest with gifts. I won't deny it — choosing a gift worthy of the Rogue Trader wasn't easy, but I tried my best. Do you like her?"

traits.locale_text: « Quand on est généreux, on ne cache pas ses sentiments ; on noie ses proches sous les cadeaux. Je ne vais pas vous mentir, j'ai eu le plus grand mal à trouver un cadeau digne d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, mais j'ai fait de mon mieux. Elle vous plaît ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Aufrichtige Herzen verbergen ihre Gefühle nicht, sondern überschütten ihre Liebsten mit Geschenken. Ich will es nicht leugnen. Es fiel mir nicht einfach, ein Geschenk zu finden, das {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} würdig ist, aber ich habe mein Bestes gegeben. Mögt Ihr sie?"
languages.original_text: "Generous hearts do not hide their feelings but shower their nearest and dearest with gifts. I won't deny it — choosing a gift worthy of the Rogue Trader wasn't easy, but I tried my best. Do you like her?"

traits.locale_text: "Aufrichtige Herzen verbergen ihre Gefühle nicht, sondern überschütten ihre Liebsten mit Geschenken. Ich will es nicht leugnen. Es fiel mir nicht einfach, ein Geschenk zu finden, das {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} würdig ist, aber ich habe mein Bestes gegeben. Mögt Ihr sie?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Cömert bir yürek, duygularını gizlemez. Onun yerine en yakınındakilere ve en sevdiklerine hediyeler yağdırır. Yalan yok, bir Hür Tacir'e layık bir hediye seçmek kolay olmadı ama elimden geleni yaptım. Beğendin mi?"
languages.original_text: "Generous hearts do not hide their feelings but shower their nearest and dearest with gifts. I won't deny it — choosing a gift worthy of the Rogue Trader wasn't easy, but I tried my best. Do you like her?"
